Name: Stop and Think
Description: Draw one card from your deck.

Name: Snap
Description:
Deal 2 damage to one enemy.
Draw this action.

Name: Beat Back
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If you have three or more hero cards in your hand, also deal 2 damage to another enemy.

Name: Submerge
Description:
Recover 3 vitality.
Blank each effect of one encounter card until tomorrow.

Name: Dabble
Description:
Recover 4 vitality.
Deal 3 damage to one enemy.
Remove 2 ‚è≥ from one duration.
Rotate one hero card on your field or your partner's field.

Name: Overpower
Description: Deal 6 damage to one enemy. If you are dealing more damage to an enemy than the amount of health they have remaining, deal the excess damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.
